name: Don't scream (Arko's Studio)
description:
Warning: game contains jumpscare!

Survive in the house where the monster lurks, and escape from it! Don't scream is a first person horror game where audio plays first fiddle.

Note from author:
Hi! I made this game solo in one week as my participation in brackey's game jam. I had a lot of fun making in. I hope you will like the idea of this game. If you encounter any issues in the web version, I highly recommend trying out standalone one. Cheers!
